name: Battlemage Training
description:
In Battlemage Training you are an aspiring Battlemage. Practice swinging your war wand with speed and precision, with the help of your mentor.

The goal of this game was to put some weight into VR melee fights, with an fun original concept. Your weapon is detached from your controller and requires timing and skill to create some destruction.

In the current release there is a single game mode, focusing on speed and precision. This is a test of skill, with multiple sets of targets that you hit with you weapon, in order to score points within a fixed timer.
